Uses of Class
org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.JCustomizer

  • Packages that use JCustomizer 
    Package Description
    org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer
    The SoftSmithy Swing Customizer Framework.
    org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.event
    Event support classes for the SoftSmithy Swing Customizer Framework.
    org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.state
    State support classes for the SoftSmithy Swing Customizer Framework.
    org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.table
    Table support classes for the SoftSmithy Swing Customizer Framework.

    • Uses of JCustomizer in org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer

      Subclasses of JCustomizer in org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTextCustomizer
      This is a base class for customizers of components, which can display a text.
      class  JButtonCustomizer
      A customizer to customize the text of an AbstractButton.
      class  JHtmlCustomizer
      A basic HTML text customizer using JEditorPane to display and edit the HTML text.
      class  JLabelCustomizer
      A customizer to customize the text of a JLabel.
      class  JLine2DCustomizer 
      class  JXIconCustomizer
      JXIconCustomizer allows visual scaling of icons.
